tig058.handin01.clubstore

Interface ClubStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextClubStore

    public interface ClubStore
    The ClubStore provides a Storage backend for the Club management system. Since we might want to change the backend and keep the upper layers intact we provide an Interface that backend providers must implement. Upper layers should instead use the ClubStore Interface, as returned by the ClubStorefactory.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearMembers()
      Clear the internal storage.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        Initiates the ClubStore

      • supports

        boolean supports(java.lang.String s)
        Returnes true if this backend supports the requested backend. So if the supplied String equals "bin" this method returns true, otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        String - the requested backend
        Returns:
        true if the String is "bin", otherwise false

      • getMembers

        java.util.ArrayList<Member> getMembers()
        Read the data from the backend as used by the classes implmenting this Interface. The data is stored internally.

      • setMembers

        void setMembers(java.util.ArrayList<Member> m)
        Replace current internal storage with the one passed via the parameter.
        Parameters:
        The - new list of Members to replace the old one.

      • storeMembers

        void storeMembers()
        Store the data. The data is stored from internal memory.

      • clearMembers

        void clearMembers()
        Clear the internal storage.
